description: a(n) = tau(n)-1 if n is odd or tau(n)-2 if n is even.
comments: Vertex-transitive graphs of valency 2 with n nodes.Number of values of k such that n divided by k leaves a remainder 2. - _Amarnath Murthy_, Aug 01 2002
references: CRC Handbook of Combinatorial Designs, 1996, p. 649.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>0} x^(3*k) / (1 - x^k). - _Michael Somos_, Apr 29 2003.a(2*n) = A069930(n). a(2*n + 1) = A095374(n). - _Michael Somos_, Aug 30 2012
maple: with(numtheory); f := n->if n mod 2 = 1 then tau(n)-1 else tau(n)-2; fi;
mathematica: Table[s = DivisorSigma[0, n]; If[OddQ[n], s - 1, s - 2], {n, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Nov 18 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, numdiv(n) - 2 + n%2)} /* _Michael Somos_, Apr 29 2003 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
